system.description:
When you choose this archetype at 2nd level you gain two specialities from Arcana, Culture, Engineering, History, Nature, and Religion. These are academic specialties.

In addition, you learn the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.ljixftygfhi0sfsf]{Guidance} cantrip, and you add spells to your spellbook for free (as per the Court Magician Expanded Spells table). You treat these spells as wizard spells. As you gain access to higher level wizard spell slots, you add more free spells to your spellbook.
